Title: Two-chan to Issho ni Miyou
Description: ['A ', Zen-chan Two-chan, ' OVA created in 1973 which contains 5 short stories as well as some live-action components. What makes this OVA unique is that the focus is Two-chan. Zen-chan does not make an appearance at all though there is a boy which a design similar to him in the final story.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' The short OVA was re-shown at "Planet Studyo +1" in 2006. It is a theater dedicated to showing extremely old and obscure films from all across the globe and often has has themed weekend events. It is open to the general public and ', Two-chan to Issho ni Miyou, ' was featured during the traffic safety event.']
Related: ['Prequel: Taabou no Ryuuguusei Daitanken', 'Sequel: Uchuu Bouei-tai Taabou no Toki no Tomatta Hoshi']
